issue.title: fix: missing fungible token balances
issue.body: **Description**: This PR fixes missing fungible token balances for accounts with large amount of tokens. It replaces the endpoint `api/v1/balances?account.id={id}` (the call returns a max of 50 token balances per account) with `/api/v1/accounts/{id}/tokens` to retrieve the token balances of an account. **Related issue(s)**: Fixes #1413 **Notes for reviewer**: **Checklist** - [ ] Documented (Code comments, README, etc.) - [x] Tested (unit, integration, etc.)

comment.body: Thank you @svienot, I have integrated a commit signing to my workflow. This and other commits should now be automatically verified.

commits.message:
fix: missing fungible token balances

Signed-off-by: --replace <tejumoladavid@gmail.com>

issue.title: fix: missing fungible token balances
issue.body: **Description**: This PR fixes missing fungible token balances for accounts with large amount of tokens. It replaces the endpoint `api/v1/balances?account.id={id}` (the call returns a max of 50 token balances per account) with `/api/v1/accounts/{id}/tokens` to retrieve the token balances of an account. **Related issue(s)**: Fixes #1413 **Notes for reviewer**: **Checklist** - [ ] Documented (Code comments, README, etc.) - [x] Tested (unit, integration, etc.)

comment.body:
Hi @svienot 
I agree that this quick fix works for now. Initially, I considered using the api/v1/accounts/0.0.768084/tokens?token.id=0.0.127877 endpoint to fetch the balance for each token. However, this might not be efficientespecially for accounts with large token holdings, as it would require making a request for each token. For example, an account with 1,000 tokens would need 1,000 API calls to the backend.

Thats why I opted for this temporary solution. One alternative we could consider is modifying the endpoint to return the total number of records. This way, wed know how many times to call the next endpoint, improving efficiency.

Im happy to explore any permanent solutions you have in mind.

Signed-off-by: --replace <tejumoladavid@gmail.com>
